mapper.update: update report set rp_vedio = #{rp_vedio,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rp_audio = #{rp_audio,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rp_worker_id = #{rp_worker_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, rp_creation = #{rp_creation,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, rp_content = #{rp_content,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where rp_id = #{rp_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select rp_id, rp_vedio, rp_audio, rp_worker_id, rp_creation, rp_content from report
